name: Hypnic (RoyalTG (Royal Toucan Games))
description:
Hypnic is a portrait mobile game, where the player is trying to fall asleep. To do that they must avoid obstacles that will cause them to wake up, at the same time collecting “sheep” which are currency the player can use to buy different hats and colour themes. 

The game has a lot of bugs at it is my first attempt at mobile development.
